comments.author: Werner
comments.body: I notice that at about 1:36 into the video there appears to be some evidence that Kimberly has sponsored Duzer's ride. I clearly saw the name "Burley" embossed on his trailer. Except, I think he misspelled it. I think it's supposed to be "Berly." But then again the Duzer is more of a video journalist than a print journalist. :-)
